article: european parliament president pat cox on friday endorsed calls for an urgent meeting of eu leaders to discuss the iraq crisis and `` mount a last ditch effort '' to get president saddam hussein to comply with u.n. disarmament demands .
abstract: eu assembly president requests european summit on iraq
